page.title: 14Where I live, near Kesgrave
page.content:
I live in East Anglia in the town of Ipswich. I live in Goring Road, at number 61. I have a garden but at the end of my road is a recreation site and I play there. It has two sets of swings, one round-about, a log fort, a slide, a climbing frame and toilets.
My house is a semi-detached house with a living room, dining room, kitchen, three bedrooms and a bathroom. In my bedroom is a chest of drawers, two shelves, a work desk and a bed. There is a vegetable patch in the garden and a lawn, a flower border, a yard for my dog, a shed and a green- house. We have a garage as well.
Goring Road is a long straight road. It is not very busy but it is always alive.
